headline: The aliens are already here  share your pictures and videos
text: The hunt for alien life has suffered a setback as Nasa's Kepler space telescope has broken down. The search goes on, with more missions to hunt for Earth-like planets scheduled. But, judging from some of your photos, it appears the aliens have already found us.           Alien outpost revealed   Something that appears out of nowhere  near London Bridge is clearly an alien outpost and requires a serious amount of analysis. Especially against such a lively spring sky        Sent via GuardianWitness    By  paperbike   3 May 2013, 22:37       Aliens have been spotted landing a magnificent spacecraft in Crystal Palace (coincidentally, just as the digital TV switchover was completed). A secret extraterrestrial outpost has been revealed near London Bridge (cunningly disguised as the Shard). And further photographic evidence suggests the invaders have even brought their mysterious radioactive pets with them.           Alien Cat       Sent via GuardianWitness    By  bromley92   24 April 2013, 13:13       Have you spotted incontrovertible proof of an alien invasion here on Earth? Please share your photos and videos on GuardianWitness by clicking the blue 'contribute' button.  GuardianWitness is the home of user-generated content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others. Posts will be published on GuardianWitness, and the best pieces featured on the Guardian site.
